Text:
Sweet! Den här hade börjat bli svår att få tag i! 
Ingår patch filerna som är helt omöjliga att få tag i i dagens läge?

Dont know if this is the right patch its either for eXperience112(american release) or The Experiment (European release) and its not the 1.2 patch that fixes most of the bugs, but still better than nothing, but be warned this could corrupt your dll in the game so you need to reinstall it: http://www.strategyinformer.com/pc/experience112/patch/18842.html
patch not for this one it says corrupted data.
